title: Write list-checkpoints.md and diff-checkpoint.md
description: Create two utility commands: list-checkpoints.md to display all checkpoints for a task with metadata, and diff-checkpoint.md to compare current state against a checkpoint to show what changed.
notes: Created two utility commands: list-checkpoints.md (display all checkpoints for task with metadata, sorting, current state indicator, compact/detailed formats) and diff-checkpoint.md (compare current state to checkpoint, show file diffs, task state changes, multiple diff formats: summary/unified/side-by-side/stat/hash-only, export capability).
